fields.name: transaction_id
fields.description: Identifies the fare transaction.

fields.name: service_date
fields.description: Service date. References GTFS

fields.name: event_timestamp
fields.description: Recorded event timestamp, including for transactions that may be aggregated values associated with a trip or vehicle.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Value of the transaction.

fields.name: currency_type
fields.description: Currency used for the transaction. References GTFS

fields.name: fare_action
fields.description:
Indicates the type of action performed.
Unknown action type: the action type is unknown or missing
Purchase: purchase a new card, ticket, pass, or other fare product
Enter: enter a fare-controlled area or vehicle
Exit: exit a fare-controlled area or vehicle
Transfer entrance: enter a fare-controlled area or vehicle at no charge due to network or fare policy rules, such as a desginated free transfer at two nearby fare-controlled stations
Transfer exit: exit a fare-controlled area or vehicle at no charge due to network or fare policy rules, such as a desginated free transfer at two nearby fare-controlled stations
Add: add stored value or stored rides to an existing fare instrument
New: obtain a new fare instrument
Capture: the device confiscated or retained the fare instrument
Extend: extend a fare product's temporal validity
Combine: combine two or more fare instruments or products into one
Void: void, cancel, negate, or undo a previous fare transaction
Activate: make a fare product active for travel
Adjust: credit or debit a fare instrument to balance an earlier transaction
Other: other action not included in this enumeration

fields.name: trip_id_performed
fields.title: ID referencing trips_performed.trip_id_performed
fields.description: Identifies the trip performed. May be null if the fare collection device is NOT located on a vehicle. May be null if on a vehicle but trip-level data is unavailable, in which case the data would be associated with the vehicle.

fields.name: trip_id_scheduled
fields.title: ID referencing trips_performed.trip_id_scheduled
fields.description: Identifies the scheduled trip. May be null if the fare collection device is NOT located on a vehicle. May be null if on a vehicle but schedule data is unavailable, in which case the data would be associated with the vehicle.

fields.name: pattern_id
fields.title: unique identifier for the route-pattern
fields.description: Identifies the unique stop-path for a trip, may be distinct from GTFS shapes.shape_id

fields.name: stop_sequence
fields.title: positive integer referencing GTFS stop_times.stop_sequence
fields.description: Ordered stop the vehicle is serving on a particular trip. May be null if the fare collection device is NOT located on a vehicle. May be null if on a vehicle but stop-level data is unavailable, in which case the data would be associated with the vehicle and/or trip. References GTFS

fields.name: vehicle_id
fields.title: ID referencing vehicles.vehicle_id
fields.description: Identifies the vehicle. May be null if collection device is NOT located on a vehicle. May be null if on a vehicle but vehicle data is unavailable, in which case the data would be associated with a trip and/or stop.

fields.name: device_id
fields.title: ID referencing devices.device_id
fields.description: Identifies the ITS device on which the fare transaction was performed. May be null if only a single device is reporting fare transactions on a vehicle and vehicle_id is provided. May be null if only a single device is reporting fare transactions at a stop and stop_id is provided.

fields.name: fare_id
fields.title: ID referencing GTFS fare_attributes.fare_id
fields.description: Identifies a fare class, as included in the GTFS Fare_attributes file. References GTFS

fields.name: stop_id
fields.title: ID referencing GTFS stops.stop_id
fields.description: Identifies the stop. References GTFS

fields.name: num_riders
fields.description: The number of riders included in the transaction.

fields.name: fare_media_id
fields.description: Indicates the fare medium that was used for the transaction.

enum: Button pressed by driver or operator to indicate a boarding or alighting passenger.

fields.name: rider_category
fields.description:
Indicates rider category (categories defined by transit agency). For example:
Adult
Youth
Student
Senior
Other reduced

fields.name: fare_product
fields.description:
Indicates the fare group (fare groups defined by transit agency). For example:
Single ride
Pass
Employer sponsored
Other pass

fields.name: fare_period
fields.description:
Indicates the fare period (fare periods defined by transit agency). For example:
All day
Peak
Off-peak
Summer
Other

fields.name: fare_capped
fields.description: Indicates if the fare charged in this transaction was modified by a fare capping policy.

fields.name: token_id
fields.description: Identifies the individual fare instrument used for the transaction. For example, the fare card ID.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: Stored value remaining on an account after the transaction is made.

name: fare_transactions.schema.json
description: Timestamped fare transaction, associated with devices.
